mapper.select: select * from member where mb_name = #{mb_name} and mb_phone = #{mb_phone};
select mb_email from member where mb_session_id = #{mb_session_id} and mb_session_expir > now();
select member.* from member join dog on member.mb_num = dog.dg_mb_num where mb_activity = '0' group by mb_num;
mapper.insert: insert into member(mb_email, mb_pw, mb_name, mb_phone) values(#{mb_email},#{mb_pw},#{mb_name},#{mb_phone})
mapper.update: update member set mb_pw = #{mb_pw}, mb_name = #{mb_name}, mb_phone = #{mb_phone}, mb_level = #{mb_level}, mb_activity = #{mb_activity} where mb_num = #{mb_num}
